titleStmt.title: The kingdomes monster vncloaked from heaven the Popish conspirators, malignant plotters, and cruell Irish, in one body to destroy kingdome, religion and lawes: but under colour to defend them, especially the Irish, who having destroyed the Protestants there, flye hither to defend the Protestant religion here.

notesStmt.note: Verse - "O England looke upon this monstrous thing,".
Verses directed against Roman Catholics and Royalists.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
